original_title: Sri Lanka rupee opens at 305.20/50 against the US dollar, bond yields unchanged
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee opened at 305.20/50 against the US dollar in the spot market on Tuesday, dealers said while bonds yields were unchanged.
A bond maturing on 01.09.2027 opened at 26.40/60 percent unchanged from 26.40/60 percent, at Monday’s close.
The rupee closed at 305.40/60 against the US dollar in the spot market on Monday. (Colombo/May22/2023)
